description:
Following an encounter with a young pickpocket named Yahiko, Kaoru risks her own freedom to gain his from some local gangsters.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gaki-zamurai Sutta! Mon Da! de Monkasei
Genç Samuray / Büyük Bir Zorluk ve Yeni Bir Öğrenci
ลูกศิษย์นักล้วงกระเป๋า
ガキ侍 スッた!モンだ!で門下生
